revised_title: A Case Study of an Extraordinary Impostume in the Stomach
tldr: The author presents a case study of a young lady with an extraordinary impostume in her stomach. The patient was treated with a combination of cooling mucilaginous mixtures, sperma ceti, laxative glysters, and mutton broth injections. The impostume eventually ruptured, leading to the release of pus and the eventual recovery of the patient.
